titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the queen at White-Hall, on the fast, July 15. 1691. By R. Meggott, D.D. Dean of Winchester, and chaplain to Their Majesties. Published by her Majesties special command.
titleStmt.author: Meggott, Richard, d. 1692.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Bennet, at the Half-Moon in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Christ Church Library, Oxford.
